verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:24
verses.text: For who will hearken unto you in this matter? but as his part is that goeth down to the battle, so shall his part be that tarrieth by the stuff: they shall part alike.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:25
verses.text: And it was so from that day forward, that he made it a statute and an ordinance for Israel unto this day.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:26
verses.text: And when David came to Ziklag, he sent of the spoil unto the elders of Judah, even to his friends, saying, Behold a present for you of the spoil of the enemies of the Lord;
